name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor
display_help: Your entire body is basically a powerful capacitor. You can store and release massive amounts of electricity that can absorb damage directed at you. Electric Armor offers better than average resistance to just about all types of damage, including Psionic, but has no defense boosting powers or resistance to Toxic. Electric Armor also offers superior resistance to Energy damage and Endurance Drain.

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor.Charged_Armor
powers.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 26.25% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, energy damage for 0.75s on self
26.25% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, energy damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor.Lightning_Field
powers.display_help: While active, you emit a storm of electricity that constantly damages all nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 8 ft. radius (10 targets max)

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor.Conductive_Shield
powers.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a Conductive Shield that will conduct many sorts of energy away from your body. Conductive Shield grants high resistant to Fire, Cold, and Energy damage, as well as good resistance to Negative Energy damage. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 26.25% resistance to fire damage, cold damage, energy damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
26.25% resistance to fire damage, cold damage, energy damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to negative energy damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor.Static_Shield
powers.display_help: You can create a field of Static Electricity around your body. This Static Shield protects you from Hold, Sleep, and Disorient effects as well as Endurance Drain, Recovery DeBuffs and enemy Teleportation. Static Shield can also help normalize your synaptic activity, granting you good resistance to Psionic Damage. Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Hold, Sleep, Disorient, End Drain, Recovery DeBuff, Psionic, Teleport)

display_info: -10.4 hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 0.75s on self
26.25% resistance to psionic damage for 0.75s on self
103.80% resistance to hold, stun, sleep for 0.75s on self
26.25% resistance to psionic damage for 0.75s on self
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 0.75s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 0.75s on self
103.80% resistance to endurance debuff, recovery rate debuff for 0.75s on target

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor.Grounded
powers.display_help: You are Grounded and naturally very resistant to Energy and Negative Energy damage. You also have added resistance to Endurance Drain effects. Additionally, Grounded provides Immobilize and Knockback protection, but only applies when you are near the ground. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.
powers.display_short_help: Auto: Self +Res (Energy, Negative, End Drain, Immobilize, KB)

display_info: 9.38% resistance to energy damage for 10.25s on self
7.50% resistance to negative energy damage for 10.25s on self
69.20% resistance to endurance debuff for 10.25s on self
-12.5 knockup protection, knock protection for 10.25s on self
207.60% resistance to immobilize for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor.Energize
powers.display_help: You can channel a tremendous amount of electricity through your body for a short period of time. Doing so will heal some hit points, reduce the endurance cost of your powers and boost your regeneration for a short time. Recharge: Long

display_info: 59.60% strength to Endurance Cost for 30s on self

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor.Lightning_Reflexes
powers.display_help: Your Lightning Reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.

display_info: 20.00% strength to recharge for 10.25s on self
40.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, recharge debuff for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor.Power_Sink
powers.display_help: Power Sink leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 10 ft. radius (10 targets max)

requires: ((((((target>arch == Class_Boss_Archvillain) || (target>arch == Class_Boss_Archvillain2)) || (target>arch == Class_Boss_Monster)) || (target>arch == Class_Boss_Mito)) || (target>arch == Class_Boss_Hamidon)) || (target>arch == Class_Boss_RularuuFM)) || (target>enttype == player)

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Electric_Armor.Power_Surge
powers.display_help: When you activate this power, you transform your body into living Electricity and become extremely resistant to all damage but Psionics, as well as Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Knockback, End Drain, Recovery DeBuff, and enemy Teleportation. Your Endurance recovery is also increased. As Power Surge wears off, the charge in your body explodes in a massive EMP pulse. However, expending all this energy will leave you exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Extremely Long

display_info: 52.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, toxic damage for 3m 0s on self
